column1: Enjoyed chatting with @KATVNews and @THV11 before voting ends today.  As your representative I’ll continue to lead the fight to:  ✅ Defeat #COVID19  ✅ Lower every Arkansan’s taxes  ✅ Grow our economy for local businesses and workers. https://t.co/xWOEPQm8eX

The weather today was absolutely terrific.  You can always count on me to put #CentralArkansas first.   I will continue to fight for #COVID19 pandemic relief cutting taxes for middle-class families and accountability in government. https://t.co/opPBo4tHHL

I am thankful to have an advocate in Washington for our schools and for our kids. That advocate is French Hill.  French has fought for our students and our teachers especially during the COVID era.  Please join me in voting for French Hill for Congress.  -Susan Cottle https://t.co/NsK7EkbIYc

If we want to rebuild our economy if we want to defeat #COVID19 if we want to restore our country I am the best person to represent you and your family.  In Congress I have delivered $8 billion in relief to struggling #CentralArkansas families workers and small businesses. https://t.co/H3NqBhiC2w

Will @GovMikeHuckabee @TomCottonAR @SteveScaliseGOP and I see you at this afternoon's BBQ?   Doors open at 5:30 PM at the Benton Event Center.  Due to #COVID19 there is limited availability.   Contact awells@arkansasgop.org to reserve your spot or call (501) 372-7301. https://t.co/628XOsELIY

Join former @GovMikeHuckabee @TomCottonAR @SteveScaliseGOP and me for some good old fashioned BBQ.  Doors open at 5:30 PM at the Benton Event Center but there is limited availability due to #COVID19.  Please contact @ARGOP to reserve your spot by calling (501) 372-7301. https://t.co/DPB4BFgtXR

Liberal Super PACs are lying about French Hill’s record in Congress.  French has always put #CentralArkansas first and always will.  Don’t let dark money groups distort French’s support of #COVID19 relief cutting taxes for middle-class families and accountability in government. https://t.co/2vynnsXmBS

Thank you @TimGriffinArk and @TimRyals for your service to #Arkansas and for your endorsements tonight.  In Congress I will continue to be your voice. From defeating the #COVID19 pandemic to keeping your family safe you can count on me to be your advocate. https://t.co/zlaJYbipM2

Join me for some good old fashioned BBQ with my friends @GovMikeHuckabee and @TomCottonAR next week!  Our event is free to the public but there is limited availability due to #COVID19.  Please reach out to @ARGOP to reserve your spot! https://t.co/DMOsaKjjXc
Friday Night Lights! Enjoyed watching these future leaders share their school spirit despite the coronavirus. #Homecoming2020 #Benton #LRCA #HallHighSchool https://t.co/MFUDfkDwVD

Great visiting @EverettFord12 Everett Chevrolet and @EverettINFINITI this afternoon in #Benton.   I enjoyed learning how Dwight and Susie Everett have adapted their dealerships’ operations and continue to serve our community in the face of the #COVID19 pandemic. #ArkansasStrong https://t.co/PGSqpKe3ig

Proud to have the endorsement of my friend Governor @AsaHutchinson. When COVID-19 hit we both went to work fighting to keep Arkansans safe and provide relief for families and workers. We will continue to work together for  Arkansas. #arpx  https://t.co/p7Juw8Or5B

There's plenty to be thankful for especially in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic. We can be thankful for our great country despite our current travails. We have family friends and #freedom! Happy #4thofJuly. https://t.co/ASIFDj59p9
